mapper.select: select count(invite_code) from t_sys_store where is_deleted = 0 and invite_code = #{inviteCode}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_customer ( cus_id, cus_name, cus_acct, phone, sex, id_card, email, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version ) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idCard}, #{email}, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)

insert into t_sys_user ( user_id, user_name, user_acct, user_pwd, phone, sex, id_card, email, role, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version ) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{userPwd}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idCard}, #{email}, 4, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
